Articles.Content:
I've always loved looking at what other people did with this game. Particularily, i love looking at people's sstos, massive cruisers and sci-fi ships and seeing them go on wonderful adventures. Before now i always looked to the spacecraft exchange for my fix, but often found myself unsatisfied. It seems that the spacecraft exchange is 75% replicas (which i'm uninterested in), 5% lifters and space stations (still not interested), 10% craft so heavily modded they don't even look like they belong in ksp, and only about 10% of what i actually like to see. And of these, only about half actually have pictures to go along with them.

But now, NOW i can see people's interplanetary adventures, their glorious eye candy, their futuristic craft so massive and capable as to push the very limits of ksp! Thank you fan works, thank you!
